Title: Lorus Gents Strap Watch RH933GX-9 RRP £49.99 Our Price £39.95 Free UK P&P
Description: Powered by Frooition.com Shop Categories About Us Lorus Gents Strap Watch RH933GX-9 RRP Â£49.99 Our Price Â£39.95 Free UK P&P Item Description Lorus Gents Strap Watch RH933GX9 Gents classic watch featuring a stainless steel case and camel coloured stitched leather strap Black sunray dial with white coloured numbers, hour markers & hands Date box Luminous hands 100m WR Case: (W) 45mm, (D) 11mm, W 64.1g Strap width:22mm. To fit wrist 230mm 2 Year Guarantee As Official Lorus Agents we have a large range in stock All Our Watches are Seiko UK Supplied, Not Third Party Imports and Have the Correct box, UK Guarantee and Serial No Please visit our to see our full range We accept cards over the telephone for same day dispatch To pay by card please telephone our shop 01643 703721 Please see payment details below Our Shop Our Shop Our Products Delivery Payment Guarantee Our Shop Francis James Jewellers is an old established business with a shop in Minehead, Somerset. Now run by Samantha James were we pride ourselves in giving good old fashion service both in our shop and online. Our well-equipped workshop ensures that the goldsmiths art is kept alive. Most repairs can be undertaken on the premises as well as the designing and making that special piece for a loved one. Our Products Our Products We keep most items in a range of sizes; please let us know if you need a special size. Please bear in mind that wider wedding rings will need to be a larger size. We are more than happy to adjust watch bracelets for you and supply extra links should you need, just let us have your wrist measurement. As Official stockists of all the brands we stock all items are brand new and supplied by the manufacturer with the correct packaging, guarantee and paperwork. We do not sell any watches fron sources other than from the legitimate UK supplier who require us to have a retail shop. We are based in Minehead Somerset. Delivery Delivery We offer a variety of domestic delivery and postal options and will always combine postages. We are also happy to ship items worldwide by traceable signed for post and courier. Whilst we try to send same day we would point out that we cannot always guarantee a delivery date. Deliveries to the US and Australia can often be held up in customs for security reasons. If delivery time is important please contact us to discuss the best options. We are also happy for goods to be collected from our shop in Minehead (You might see something else you like!) Payment Payment We can accept payment by Paypal Guarantee Guarantee We give a full guarantee on all our goods as well as the manufacture's own guarantee. We only sell gold and sterling silver jewellery, not plated items. As Authorised stockists we only sell watches and clocks with the correct UK serial number and guarantee. We are, of course, happy to accept returns within 14 days of receipt for full refund or exchange. We do however make most wedding rings to order and can exchange for another size or style. We want you to be pleased with your purchase, if you have a problem please contact us so we can help.
